instructions: Turn on the Android device. Using the USB cable that came with your phone, plug the USB end into your computer and the other end into your phone. You'll need to allow USB debugging. To do so, go to Settings > Developer options and tap either USB debugging or Android debugging . Check your notifications and tap the USB item for more options, then tap Transfer files . You'll see your Android appear as an available device to browse in Windows File Explorer , allowing you to copy files from your Android phone to your PC.
